update tb_talent_customer
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=BIGINT},
order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},

create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tb_talent_customer set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_money = #{orderMoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, commission_money = #{commissionMoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id , b.vip_id ,b.head_image,b.nick_name,b.create_time from tb_user_agency as a LEFT JOIN tb_user as b on a.user_id =b.id where a.p_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.vip_id <> null order by create_time desc
